title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the project properties to use the project as source folder and output location, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. When the output location is set first, it creates an illegal state.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. Open the project properties and change the setting to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
